item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Critical Metals, Comerica, Advanced Micro Devices, Abercrombie & Fitch and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves midday.

item.title: Paul Tudor Jones says ingredients are in place for massive rally before a 'blow off' top to bull market
item.description: Paul Tudor Jones said today's market is reminiscent of the setup leading up to the burst of the dot-com bubble in late 1999.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: AMD, Comerica, Micron Technology and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in early trading.

item.title: Mike Novogratz's Galaxy Digital jumps 10% after launching retail trading app to compete against Robinhood
item.description: Galaxy Digital introduced a commission-free trading platform, Galaxy One, on Monday that offers similar services to rival Robinhood.

item.title: Investors may want to consider boosting their exposure abroad â€” even with U.S. stocks around record highs
item.description: "Home bias is about as bad as it's ever been in the United States," ETF.com's Dave Nadig told CNBC's "ETF Edge" this week.
